snippet: Nearly one billion people worldwide defecate in the open, the United Nations said in a report released Monday, which calls for greater effort and funding to redress inadequate sanitation.
abstract: United Nations reports it has found that nearly one billion people worldwide defecate in the open, and that such bad sanitation practices can endanger health of children who live and play nearby; calls for more funding to redress inadequate sanitation.
lead_paragraph: Nearly one billion people worldwide defecate in the open, the United Nations said in a report released Monday, which calls for greater effort and funding to redress inadequate sanitation.

headline.main: U.N. Report Calls for Public Sanitation Funding
